00058 MAS5Engine * MAS5Engine::FromBase(BaseEngine *engine)
00059 {
00060         if (engine != NULL && engine->getEngineName() == MAS5Engine::EngineName())
00061                 return (MAS5Engine *)engine;
00062         return NULL;
00063 }

00065 MAS5Engine::MAS5Engine() {
00066     defineOptions();
00067 }

00069 MAS5Engine::~MAS5Engine() {
00070 }

00072 void MAS5Engine::defineOptions() {
00073 
00074   defineOptionSection("Input Options");
00075   defineOption("", "cel-files", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00076                      "Text file specifying cel files to process, one per line with the first line being 'cel_files'.",
00077                      "");
00078   defineOption("c", "cdf-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00079                      "File defining probe sets.",
00080                      "");
00081   defineOption("", "algo-params", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00082                      "File with MAS5 algorithm parameters.",
00083                      "");
00084   defineOption("", "control-params", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00085                      "File with MAS5 control parameters.",
00086                      "");
00087   defOptMult("", "chip-type", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00088                      "Chip types to check library and CEL files against. "
00089                      "Can be specified multiple times. "
00090                      "The first one is propigated as the chip type in the output files. "
00091                      "Warning, use of this option will override the usual check between chip types "
00092                      "found in the library files and cel files. You should use this option instead "
00093                      "of --force when possible. ",
00094                      "");
00095 
00096   defineOptionSection("Output Options");
00097   defineOption("", "cc-chp-output", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00098                     "Output results in AGCC format.",
00099                     "true");
00100   defineOption("", "xda-chp-output", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00101                     "Output results in XDA/GCOS format.",
00102                     "false");
00103 
00104   defineOptionSection("Engine Options (Not used on command line)");
00105   defOptMult("", "cels", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00106                      "Cel files to process.",
00107                      "");
00108   defOptMult("", "result-files", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00109                      "CHP file names to output. Must be paired with cels.",
00110                      "");
00111 }
00112 
00113 void MAS5Engine::defineStates() {
00114   defineOption("", "num-rows", PgOpt::INT_OPT,
00115                      "The number of rows on the chip.",
00116                      "-1");
00117   defineOption("", "num-cols", PgOpt::INT_OPT,
00118                      "The number of cols on the chip.",
00119                      "-1");
00120   defineOption("", "probe-count", PgOpt::INT_OPT,
00121                      "The number of probes on the chip.",
00122                      "-1");
00123 }
00124 
00125 /**
00126  * Make sure that our options are sane. Call Err::errAbort if not.
00127  */
00128 void MAS5Engine::checkOptionsImp() {
00129 
00130   defineStates();
00131 
00132   setLibFileOpt("cdf-file");
00133   setLibFileOpt("algo-params");
00134   setLibFileOpt("control-params");
00135 
00136   std::string cdfFile = getOpt("cdf-file");
00137 
00138   if(cdfFile == "")
00139       Err::errAbort("Must specify either a cdf file");
00140 
00141   bool ccOut = getOptBool("cc-chp-output");
00142   bool xdaOut = getOptBool("xda-chp-output");
00143   if(ccOut && xdaOut) 
00144       Err::errAbort("You can only set cc-chp-output or xda-chp-output. Not both.");
00145 
00146   if(!ccOut && !xdaOut)
00147       Err::errAbort("You must set either cc-chp-output or xda-chp-output.");
00148 
00149   string outDir = getOpt("out-dir");
00150 
00151   /* Read in cel file list from other file if specified. */
00152   vector<string> celFiles;
00153   EngineUtil::getCelFiles(celFiles, this);
00154   if(celFiles.size() == 0)
00155       Err::errAbort("No cel files specified.");
00156   setOpt("cels",celFiles);
00157     
00158   vector<string> resultFiles = getOptVector("result-files");
00159   if(resultFiles.size() > 0) {
00160       if(celFiles.size() != resultFiles.size())
00161         Err::errAbort("result-files option used but is not the same size as cel file listing");
00162   }
00163 
00164   // setup output folder
00165   if(!Fs::isWriteableDir(outDir)) {
00166     if(Fs::mkdirPath(outDir, false) != APT_OK) {
00167       Err::errAbort("Can't make or write to directory: " + ToStr(outDir));
00168     }
00169   }
00170 
00171   // Check chip types
00172   vector<string> chipTypesInLayout;
00173 
00174   /* Get the intial info about the chip and check cel files to make sure
00175      they match. */
00176   colrow_t numRows = 0, numCols = 0;
00177   int probeCount=0;
00178   int probeSetCount=0;
00179   if (cdfFile != "") {
00180     EngineUtil::getCdfChipType(chipTypesInLayout, numRows, numCols, probeCount, probeSetCount, cdfFile);
00181   }
00182 
00183   setOpt("num-rows", ToStr(numRows));
00184   setOpt("num-cols", ToStr(numCols));
00185   setOpt("probe-count", ToStr(probeCount));
00186 
00187   if (chipTypesInLayout.empty() || chipTypesInLayout[0] == "" || probeCount == 0) {
00188     Err::errAbort("Problem determining ChipType in file: " + cdfFile);
00189   }
00190 
00191   /* Did the user "force" a set of chip types via options? */
00192   vector<string> chipTypesSupplied = getOptVector("chip-type");
00193 
00194   /* Figure out what chip type to report */
00195   if(chipTypesSupplied.size() > 0) {
00196       setOpt("chip-type", chipTypesSupplied[0]);
00197   } else if(chipTypesInLayout.size() > 0) {
00198       setOpt("chip-type", chipTypesInLayout[0]);
00199   } else {
00200       Err::errAbort("Unable to figure out a chip type.");
00201   }
00202 
00203   /* Do Chip Type Check */
00204   if(!getOptBool("force")) {
00205     vector<string> chipTypeJustPrimary;
00206     vector<string> chipTypesToCheck;
00207 
00208     if(chipTypesSupplied.size() > 0) {
00209         chipTypesToCheck = chipTypesSupplied;
00210         EngineUtil::checkChipTypeVectors(chipTypesSupplied, chipTypesInLayout);
00211     } else {
00212         chipTypesToCheck = chipTypesInLayout;
00213     }
00214 
00215     chipTypeJustPrimary.push_back(chipTypesToCheck[0]);
00216     EngineUtil::checkCelChipTypes(chipTypesToCheck, probeCount, celFiles, numRows, numCols);
00217 
00218   }
00219 }
00220 
00221 
00222 void MAS5Engine::runImp() {
00223         m_Mas5.SaveToLegacyFile() = getOptBool("xda-chp-output");
00224 
00225     string algParams = getOpt("algo-params");
00226     if(algParams != "")
00227         MAS5ParameterExtraction::ExtractParameters(algParams.c_str(), m_Mas5.AlgParameters());
00228 
00229     string ctrlParams = getOpt("control-params");
00230     if(ctrlParams != "")
00231         ExpressionControlsParameterExtraction::ExtractParameters(
00232                 ctrlParams.c_str(), m_Mas5.ProbePairThreshold(), m_Mas5.ReportControls());
00233 
00234     m_Mas5.ProgramName() = StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(getOpt("program-name"));
00235     m_Mas5.ProgramCompany() = StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(getOpt("program-version"));
00236     ///@todo what to report for ProgramId?
00237     //m_Mas5.ProgramId() = newVal;
00238 
00239     string baselineFile;
00240     string cdfFile = getOpt("cdf-file");
00241     vector<string> celFiles = getOptVector("cels");
00242     vector<string> resultFiles = getOptVector("result-files");
00243     Verbose::progressBegin(1, ToStr("Processing cel files"), celFiles.size(), 0, celFiles.size());
00244     for(size_t i=0; i<celFiles.size(); i++) {
00245         Verbose::progressStep(1);
00246         string celFile = celFiles[i];
00247         string resultFile;
00248         if(resultFiles.size() > 0) {
00249             resultFile = resultFiles[i];
00250         }
00251         else {
00252           resultFile = Fs::join(getOpt("out-dir"),Fs::basename(celFiles[i]));
00253           resultFile = Fs::noextname1(resultFile) + ".chp";
00254         }
00255             bool success = m_Mas5.Execute(celFile, baselineFile, cdfFile, resultFile);
00256         if(!success)
00257             Err::errAbort("Failure in MAS5 execution");
00258     }
00259     Verbose::progressEnd(1, ToStr("Done."));
00260 }
